Articles.Content: I gave up on the whole reinventing thing, while im still not copying, im doing really simple weapons, so i would assume its already done

...oh no, i've done it again.

Due to the fact that i've forgot the current Drek number, I decided to restart at 20 (XX). This one is 165 tonnes, has 5 LFASMs, and has a better range than the previous ones (due to the fact that i've sandwiched several fuel tanks more than should be in the hull) and extended the fuel hull by two meters.

Just going to join now.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I hope we don't have to launch without cheating.

Rocketscientist, we do not, Hyperedit is fine

Also, want to have a small battle? the best way to learn in the KSP weapons buisness is actual experience... it helps both sides.

Okay, I hope my small fleet is good enough, I don't have hyperedit and coding is not my strongpoint. I guess i should put downloads up.

EDIT: Air, sea, land or space?
space please, I have 54 ton, 77 ton, 156 ton and 188 ton ships. You set up and make rules, ill set up second and go first.
By set up, How do I get ships there without hyperedit? i can try save editing, also do i need your craft files?

Just going to join now.

http://imgur.com/a/9ceqk

I hope we don't have to launch without cheating.

Edited April 10, 2014 by daemonCaptrix

By set up, How do I get ships there without hyperedit? i can try save editing, also do i need your craft files?

I just use hyperedit, and no you dont need my craft files, you just send me persist and i put my ships in, then i send it back and you overwrite your persist with my new one.
just realized my ships have no RCS/ reaction wheels:blush:, wont have battle ready tonight tonight

http://i.imgur.com/36wB01M.png

http://i.imgur.com/My1FOY4.png

"Plane" is nearly identical to my P-51 based "Horsefly". And "Black Knight" Is nearly identical to The Fleet Master's "Spooky".

Had a plane like your horsefly in .23 but it didn't work, I saw the horsefly and some of the things on it helped overcome the challenges, The spooky is just a coincidence.

Ill give you 'Plane' and you can see the differences.

This is the problem with two people basing a plane off of the same plane.

http://www./view/rdgho57u2in40qr/Fighter.craft

And before it gets out of hand, the Inquisition was based off of the Pandora, it looked nice and wasn't to hard to throw together

Edited April 10, 2014 by RocketscientistV

Had a plane like your horse fly in .22 but it didn't work, I saw the horsefly and some of the things on it helped overcome the challenges, The spooky is just a coincidence.

Ill give you 'Plane' and you can see the differences.

This is the problem with two people basing a plane off of the same plane.

http://www./view/rdgho57u2in40qr/Fighter.craft

You seriously expect me to believe that?

The thing is, if you'd asked to copy the design, I would have sent it to you. But now you're pretending you thought of it first. Don't be proud.

----------------------------------------

You linked the craft for the Macey Dean space fighter. lol

----------------------------------------

You'd be the third person to build a Pandora-like supercarrier. Since it's such a straight-forward design, I don't think of it as copying what I did.

The Horsefly, on the other hand, is a complex design utilizing elements unique to my design style. If you want, I can send you the actual craft for it so you can use the real thing. Just don't pretend you made it.

Edited April 10, 2014 by daemonCaptrix

I'm not going to let this go to far, I'm sorry for similarities between 'Plane' and horsefly, I can make a new plane to fill its space in my fleet if you want.

The spooky isn't that similar to mine but some later modifications to 'Plane' were based loosely off of some horsefly features.
The Horsefly looks cool, but if you want an awesome plane, you should ask me for the Vespid.

Test result of the new "Firefall" weapon system is going incredibly well. I have so far installed them onto the new Salvation MKIV (note* the one pictured in my album is MKIV before Firefall was installed) and a new ship I made last night, the Eden Class Gunboat.

The next ship I may put Firefall on is my Gideon MKII Frigate as it should be a simple to install it on to

Edited April 10, 2014 by War Eagle 1

----------------------------------------

You linked the craft for the Macey Dean space fighter. lol

----------------------------------------

Well that has no smilarities to either of our planes, here. http://www./view/gdfv0p9dxqq5cva/Plane.craft

The only thing i took from your plane was the SAS on the nose, I didn't think that was such a feature that I should credit 1 part that I took. Although the P-51 is an amazing plane.

Alright well I can see you only borrowed a couple of things. I don't blame you for taking the propeller idea. It's neat! xD

Here's a comparison. As you can see, neither plane looks all that much like the real P-51.

anyone else having avatar problems? It wont let me add/change mine...

anyone else having avatar problems? It wont let me add/change mine...

The Internet has had enough Nicholas Cage already.
zeke, im awaiting your battle, i have sent my persist, and the ship is a 54 ton ship from you, meeting in low mun orbit.
Zekes, I've made my move and gotten some screens. However, my game crashed right after I saved the persist, and I'm busy with family right now, so I'll try to post it tonight or tomorrow.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The USC is ready for battle

// COMBAT REPORT: //

MU Corvette Beta-3 attacks USSZS Malevolence.

The bombardment appears to have heavily damaged the ship and ruined its balance and fuel reserves, but the ship's heavy armor has prevented it from being "disabled".

First shot opened a hole in the hull...

Second hit ripped apart internal supports...

...and the final 2 hit some sort of fuel tank near the CoM. causing a chain reaction that blew off a huge chunk of the drive section.

Seeing this, the pilot of Beta-3 went to retrieve some ammo (game crashed right as I went to grab a pic of this, due to my hotel's slower computers ) from the wrecks of the MU Battlecruisers, then flew to an escort position near the MU Nicholas J. Fury.

Zekes, I challenge you to try and take out my grounded ships in your next move. (Also, I'd like to see what my Battlecruisers can to yours )

Persist:

http://www./download/bao4mhe6m08ju4t/persistent.sfs

The bombardment appears to have heavily damaged the ship and ruined its balance and fuel reserves, but the ship's heavy armor has prevented it from being "disabled".

"Heavy Armor" Hahaha that stuff is paper compared to what Dreks used to have...

Zekes, I challenge you to try and take out my grounded ships in your next move. (Also, I'd like to see what my Battlecruisers can to yours )

Ok, ill let one of those battlecruisers live a while, and I'll take out a ground ship taking turn now.

Surprisingly, Malevolence was only lightly damaged, and the fuel feed to all 4 engines was still intact. Im honestly quite amazed you didnt manage to sever any of them

I tried to land Phineas on Eeloo, but it only had one engine and was unable to make it down safely, so I aborted and went into a low orbit.

Malevolence paid the price. She landed at 9m/s, but was not strong enough to survive the crash. She broke up into two peices. However, the front section remained intact, and a missile was launched, hitting the Lead Corvette in the rear.

But she was in range!

Not much damage was done but the fuel tanks were all knocked out, meaning she was stuck there for good.

Her pilot has been cordially invited to have tea at Malevolence, should he feel up for the 1.5km walk.

PERSIST

https://www./?3gwz0288gnx5fje
